headline: J.D. Vance Defends Bombastic Rhetoric: ‘Our Country is Kind of a Joke’
author: Alex Griffing
sentences:
Vance gave a surprising answer to a local Ohio reporter last week when asked how he justifies some of his more bombastic rhetoric, saying that “our country is kind of a joke.”
